reviews.review: Best coop game
fajne

This series of game is incredibly interesting, funny and challenging. It involves a multiplayer mode as well that takes great coordination. I highly recommend this game to everyone as it may be one of my favorites of all time.
mikemmel oyun. √∂ncesinde bitirmi≈ütim. arkada≈üla coop oynamak i√ßin aldƒ±k. s√ºper sarƒ±yor. √ßok zevkli. her ≈üeyiyle bir ≈üahaser

"Portal 2" is an amazing computer game in the puzzle genre, developed by Valve Corporation in 2011. As I said before in my previous review about "Portal 1": it has revolutionary and interesting gameplay, which has never met anywhere else in games. 

"Portal 1" had only 19 levels, which, according to the end of the game, become more complex and hard. In comparison with it "Portal 2" is not so short game... If I passed "Portal 1" in 5 hours, then the "Portal 2" I passed in 10 hours (and don`t forget about the cooperative game mode, which has another storyline and more difficult levels)
The plot of "Portal 2" became more complex and interesting. I got great pleasure from the "end level battle" (battle with the boss). I am sure that this moment of the game will be remembered for a long time in my memory.
Graphics level became more better in comparison with the first part, The size of giant laboratories look really impressive.
I have not found any disadvantages in the game, I consider "Portal 2" as a great example of how puzzle games should be made in our time. I believe that everyone has to have this game in his own game library or at least try to play this game at least once.

My personal mark for this game 10/10, but I advise you to buy this game only during the sale and only with the game "Portal 1", since together they are sold at a very good price.

Buy it, play it, play some community test chambers, play the normal game again, play some more community chambers, and then repeat until you die. 

There is no other game like this today because its so defining in its gimic, that any game even coming close to this will be labeled a 'Portal Clone'. 

The story is comical and enjoyable, the puzzles are trivial but satisfying, and this game is overall just a classic.
This game is awesome! I love the plot twist and how funny Wheatly is. I had no problems the entire time I played through. It is a good challenge
Well here we are again. Classic sequel to a classic game. Let's see if Valve will ever get the guts to create a true third entry to this series and give us a trilogy.
Amazing game with a wonderful story that kept me playing (its so short tho) and I was angry when it was over.
[i]Portal 2[/i] √© um √≥timo jogo. A campanha √© fant√°stica, e o modo cooperativo √© extremamente divertido.

Bir arkada≈üƒ±nƒ±zla oynayabileceƒüiniz gelmi≈ü ge√ßmi≈ü en iyi puzzle oyunu olabilir. √ñzellikle son b√∂l√ºmlerine doƒüru arttƒ±rdƒ±ƒüƒ± gerginlik oyun atmosferine ve hikayesine cuk oturuyor. Final kƒ±smƒ± biraz daha zor olabilirdi ama bu kesinlikle bir eksiklik deƒüil. 9/10

idk its just fun...

the puzzles are challenging and fun, portal mechanic is legendary, 

story is much better than portal 1, you do need to play portal 1 to understand this one, its only like 2.5 hours so play it before this one 
Portal 2 is about 8 or 9 hours long, but the multiplayer can add about 5 to 6 hours
jeder kennt es, jeder mag es, jeder spielt es. super Fortsetzung des ersten Teils
Eines der geilsten spiele auf dem Markt! Ich verstehe nicht wieso es keinen 3. Teil gibt...
This is my favorite game of all time. The story is great, the mechanics are great, the custom levels are great, everything is great. I just wish there was a Portal 3!

Improves on Portal 1 in nearly every way, other than maybe losing out on the simplicity that kinda works in the original's favor.  Amazing story, looks great, good puzzles, has everything going for it.

5 REASONS TO BUY THIS GAME :
1-It's just a fucking amazing game, the story is fucking perfect! This game is a classic
2-You don't need a monster pc to run it, a low end pc will do it. You don't need a high end pc with i9, rtx and 64gb... 4ram, i3 and even built-in gpu are good enough to run this game
3-Amazing graphics (For a 2011 game)
4-It's absurdly cheap! Buy it now or maybe wait a bit for a steam special (Summer special coming soon..) For about only 10$ CAD this game is worth every penny
5-There is tons of DLC available so even when you're done playing the real/whole story you still can play the game

Selbst nach dem dritten Durchspielen von Portal 2 ist es immer wieder spa√üig diesen Teil der Reihe zu spielen. Durch Wheatley, GLaDOS, Cave Johnson und noch ein paar weitere Charaktere gibt es lustige Textstellen welche perfekt im Original aber auch sehr gut in der Synchro umgesetzt sind. Egal in welcher Sprache hat Portal 2 definitiv wiederspielwert.
Selbst nach dem dritten Durchgang.

Juego buenisimo desde principio a fin.

game for smart people

This is still a great game! Revisited Portal 2 now in 2019 and it doesn't disappoint! I think the graphics is very good looking, and considering the game was released back in 2011, Valve has a great potential for making new video games like this! The eight year old Portal 2 don't look outdated!
In Portal 2, you are introduced to an interesting environment in form of Aperture's testing facility, with its many puzzles to solve using your mind combined with the portal gun. You meet the robot Wheatley, who provides you with lots of humoristic statements and is a great companion, with his natural way of talking in different situations. The game mecanics feels authentic with everything from walking trough portals to lifting blocks. It's a lot of fun solving the puzzles, which usually goes fine, but some are more difficult and requires more time to think. Even then, the puzzles are always satisfying and feel rewarding to complete.

Portal 2 delivers several hours of entertaining puzzlesolving! I really enjoyed this game!

Amazing. Great story, hilarious characters, and mind-boggling puzzles! I definitely recommend this game. It also has a feature where you can play with a friend, or somebody else with no friends! You can even create your own puzzles, and play the ones others made! They can even be multiplayer! And if the price should change at all, it should only go up! Great fun for any players.
